Articles.Content:
So I downloaded the full release of Kerbal Space Program 1.1 yesterday, and the terrain is glitchy. Its all black. It never did this in the pre-releases. I've taken all my mods out, I've downgraded to 1.0.5 then upgraded again, I've even reinstalled it and it's still there.

Screenshot of Terrain

Edited April 21, 2016 by Battledamaged10

I had the same issue.  It would happen every time I build a rocket and pressed launch button exiting the VAB.  I fixed this by removing the force opengl option I had been using before in the shortcut for the game.  Might want to try removing that if you were using it in the past also.
